long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
🅿️ Patreon Scraper features
✓ No password, API login or permissions required
✓ Runs in the background; switch tabs with ease
✓ Simple and easy to use
✓ 24/7 developer support

🤔 How to use the Patreon Scraper Extension?
Visit a user’s Patreon, scroll down, click on "See all x posts" or visit patreon.com/user/posts then open the extension, set your limit or how many items you wish to scrape, then click on the “Scrape” button to start scraping.

⚠️ Important
For the extension to work, make sure your Patreon web language is set to English.

💳 Pricing, Return and Refund Policy
● Access all features for just $18.99/month. No account required to sign up, and you can cancel at any time, no questions asked!
● No functionality of this extension is available unless you are subscribed to a paid subscription.
● The available payment methods are Credit/Debit cards.
● Google is not the seller of this service.

📝 Disclaimer 
Patreon Scraper does NOT belong or is related to the official Patreon application/website in any way. It is an unofficial app that is developed and maintained independently.
